toggle_radar_xmitting.title: Police Radar Toggle XMIT
toggle_radar_xmitting.onDown: local police_radar = controller.getController('policeRadar'); if police_radar then police_radar.toggleRadarXmitting() end

toggle_doppler_sound.title: Police Radar Toggle Doppler Sound
toggle_doppler_sound.onDown: local police_radar = controller.getController('policeRadar'); if police_radar then police_radar.toggleRadarDopplerSound() end

lock_strongest_speed.title: Police Radar Lock Strongest Speed
lock_strongest_speed.desc: Locks the strongest signal vehicle speed
lock_strongest_speed.onDown: local police_radar = controller.getController('policeRadar'); if police_radar then police_radar.lockStrongestSpeed() end

lock_fastest_speed.title: Police Radar Lock Fastest Speed
lock_fastest_speed.onDown: local police_radar = controller.getController('policeRadar'); if police_radar then police_radar.lockFastestSpeed() end
